text: kemi‘iminanimi yehonu huleti ch’ifirochi bigadelu bemekakelachewi asitarik’u፡፡ kehuletu anidenyayitumi belelayitu layi weseni bitalifi yachini weseni yemitalifewini wede alahi ti‘izazi isikemitimelesi diresi tegadelu፡፡ bitimelesimi bemekakelachewi betikikili asitarik’u፡፡ benegeru hulu asitekakilumi፡፡ alahi asitekakayochini yiwedalina፡፡
